package com.tecnoElevate;

public class fish extends Animal {
	private int eyes;
	private int tail;
	private int fin;
	
	

	public fish(String name, int brain, int eyes, int fins, int weight,int tail) {
		super(name, 1, 1, fins, weight);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
		this.eyes=eyes;
		this.fin=fin;
		this.tail=tail;
	}
	public void pallet() {
		System.out.println("fish.pallet()claeed");
	}
	public void eat() {
	 pallet();
	}
	public void swim(int n ) {
		System.out.println(" fish can swim  wtih the speed of  "+n);
	}


}
